result.execSummary:
The defendant Sean M. Creamer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Sean M. Creamer is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Sean M. Creamer was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Sean M. Creamer was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Minutes:  14CF1264/14CF1449.  Clerk/T. Lema.  Special Pros K R Wells appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in person w/Atty Andrea Rufo.

14CF1264 - Count 1 amended to battery.  Amended information filed.  Deft placed on probation for two years.  See conditions.

Minutes:  14CF1264/14CF1449.  Clerk/T. Lema.  Special Pros K R Wells appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Val Karls.  Discussion ensues regarding the conviction for strangulation and the history of the deft and complaining witness (Steven M has prior conviction for battery against this deft).  Court proceeds to sentencing.  Sentencing arguments made by all parties including the court.  Prior to imposition of sentence, State raises a question of whether the court can grant expunction (per plea agreement) on the charge of strangulation/suffocation.  Court will need to look at this further.  Balance of sentencing hrg adjourned to 5/8/15 @ 10:45am.  Court amends deft's bond in 14CF1449 to $500 signature.  Conditions - not to possess or consume alcohol.  not to possess or consume illegal substances.  No contact w/Steven M or his residence.  NOTE - as soon as deft has a residence/phone number he will contact the court to update the record.

Minutes:  14CF1264/14CF1449.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Krejcarek appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Karls.  Cases are resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  

14CF1264 - deft pleads guilty to counts 1 & 2; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.

14CF1449 - deft pleads guilty to counts 2 & 3; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.

PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 4/2/15 @ 3:30pm.

Minutes:  NO RECORD TAKEN.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Hinshaw appeared for the State.  Atty Karls appeared on behalf of deft.  Deft not transported from the KCJ due to ongoing jury trial.  Atty Karls reports the cases are settled.  Plea hrg set for 2/26/15 @ 10:45am.

*Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No drug paraphernalia.  *No Contact w/Steven M and Vicky C or their residences.

Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Val Karls. Clerk LE.  Prelim. waived, probable cause found. Bound over to Br. 3. Information filed, plea of not guilty. Judicial pretrial on 2-11-15 @ 9:50am. Jury selection on 3-2-15 @ 9:00am with 14CF1264. Atty. Karls has filed bond motion and argues for bond modification. State opposes modification. Bond modified to $500 cash with the same conditions.
to Preliminary Hearing
